entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow beginning early this morning then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
